personal.name: Abdullah Javed
personal.title: AI & ML Enthusiast | Flutter & React Developer
personal.subtitle: Building smart, useful, and impactful tech solutions that make a real difference
personal.bio: Hi, I'm Abdullah Javed 👋 I'm a final-year Computer Science student at COMSATS University Islamabad, Wah Campus. I love working on machine learning, computer vision, and intelligent applications, and I'm also passionate about deep learning, NLP, and full-stack development. My goal is simple: to build smart, useful, and impactful tech solutions that make a real difference. 🚀

certificates.title: Neural Networks and Deep Learning
certificates.description: Comprehensive course covering artificial neural networks, deep learning fundamentals, performance tuning, supervised learning, computer vision, machine learning, and AI concepts using Python programming.

certificates.title: Learn Modern Javascript by Coding a Snake Game
certificates.description: Practical JavaScript course focused on modern JavaScript concepts and best practices while building an interactive snake game project.

projects.title: YOLOv7 GPU Mode
projects.description: 🚀 High-performance object detection project using YOLOv7 in GPU mode for real-time computer vision applications.

projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: A machine learning-based movie recommender system that suggests movies based on similarity algorithms and user preferences.

projects.title: SMS Spam Classifier
projects.description: 📱 A comprehensive ML project that detects spam SMS using Naive Bayes and other algorithms, with an interactive web interface.

projects.title: BMI Calculator App
projects.description: 📱 A beautiful and responsive BMI calculator built with Flutter for Android/iOS platforms.

projects.title: Snake Game (Modern JavaScript)
projects.description: 🎮 A fun snake game built with modern JavaScript concepts for learning purposes.

projects.title: Data Structures in C++
projects.description: 📚 A collection of data structure implementations (Stacks, Queues, Linked Lists, Trees, Graphs) in C++.
